resources.string: Press \"Toggle Mode\" to toggle between \"GPA to Letter\" and \"Letter to GPA\" modes
Enter numerical grade below and press \"Calculate\" to receive a GPA
Enter number of questions, along with number of wrong answers below to receive a percent grade, fractional grade, and letter grade
Enter grade percentage and grade weight into provided input fields and press \"Calculate\" to receive you average grade.

This grade calculator app contains five grade-related calculators to help calculate this like grade weights, test marks, and GPAs.

The grade average calculator takes in percentage and weight and outputs your overall grade. The test score calculator takes in the number of questions, and the number of wrong questions and outputs percentage, fraction, and letter grade. The percentage to GPA calculator takes in a numeral grade percentage and outputs GPA. Finally, the GPA to letter calculator has two modes to toggle between GPA to letter and letter to GPA, where the calculators take in either GPA or a letter and output the opposite.

Additionally, there is an exam scheduler where you can save the date of an exam and the app will send a notification a day before the saved exam date.
To set an exam timer notification, select the day of your exam and give it a unique name to save as. The app will send a notification a day before your set exam date
This list contains all saved exam notifications. Use the clear button below to clear all notifications
